name: Follow My Steps
description:
"- The adventure video game with Disney/Pixar undertones."

ADD TO WISHLIST TO STAY TUNED !

Lead and protect a mother wolf and her pup seeking a new shelter. Explore a dreamlike universe through numerous environments. Make the right choices to take care and educate your cub.
Survive together and try to escape from the Midnight Pack…

The story told by this game draws its inspiration from the codes used in Pixar Animation Studio’s movies. Dealing with mature themes such as parenthood, legacy, the sense of responsibility, determinism and the commitment to help others, this game aims at providing a fun and positive breath of fresh air.

The gameplay will propose to explore a vast and vibrant world. You will need roam and adapt to the sometimes dangerous wilderness. Exploration, survival, infiltration and moral choices are at the core of the gaming experience.

You will also be able to collect magical plants, discover your powers and meet new friends during your quest.

Dive into the seven chapters and write your story with our two heroes. Build and discover their relationship and the environment to explore.

Inspired by It’s a Beautiful Life, Finding Nemo, The Lion King, Princess Mononoke, The Last Guardian, God Of War 3; Follow My Steps offers a unique adventure and a highly emotional story. The game was already awarded the winning prize of the Gamecup, the French Cup rewarding the creation of independent video games!
